p: The general characteristic EEG features of encephalopathy are slowing and focal or generalized epileptiform features [ 25]. More specific patterns have also been described. Periodic lateralized epileptiform discharges have been regarded as pathognomonic for HSE, but it may also occur in patients with SSPE [ 10]. An early reactive EEG background and extreme spindles have been associated with anti-NDMAR encephalitis [ 42].
